name: Super Cycle Chase
description:
Welcome to a local multiplayer experience like no other! Join Rock Man, Paper Boy and Mr. Scissors in an intense chase to see who can tackle the element they beat  first!

In this game, three players battle it out, where each player must catch whoever is weak to them first, while also avoiding the other player who must catch them. Successfully catch the player weak to you a number of times to win.

There are two leagues: platform and top-down. Each league has three distinct areas and a random level that shift's between each league's three areas. Also available is the ultra league which tours every area in the game for maximum chaos.

Required: Three players

Recommended: Three controllers (Xbox or PS4)

Menu controls:

Control MethodKeyboardXbox controllerPS4 controllerSelectArrow keysLeft Stick/D-padLeft Stick/D-padConfirmSpacebarA buttonX button

In-game controls can be accessed via "Controls & Instructions" from title menu.

This is the first game I ever programmed in Unity, and it was something I really wanted to be my own. I have been working on it since last year, but it was recently when I took part in a game jam that I felt motivated to return to this and make it more polished. It wasn't easy, but I'm glad I made it to this stage. Thank you very much for playing.
